abstract: Defense Dept revises 2015 Law of War Manual, strengthening rules about when it is lawful to fire on military targets while civilians are nearby; department overhauled sections of manual in July to improve protections for journalists working in combat zones.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The changes are the second time this year that the Defense Department has modified its Law of War Manual in response to criticism that portions were inaccurate or dangerous.
snippet: The changes are the second time this year that the Defense Department has modified its Law of War Manual in response to criticism that portions were inaccurate or dangerous....

headline.main: To Protect Civilians, Pentagon Tightens Rules on Combat
headline.print_headline: Combat Rules to Protect Civilians Are Revised
